document_data.mainbody:
Eldgull was a sailor aboard the Wicked Wench fishing and cargo vessel that sailed Maer Dualdon and the Shaengarne River in the early 14 century DR.
Eldgull was a human albino man and a hard worker who felt at home aboard a ship, more than he ever did on land.
In the , the Wicked Wench was among several ships that carried reinforcements of mercenaries and adventurers from the city of Luskan to Targos, to aid the towns defense against the Legion of the Chimera. Eldgull was working aboard the ship at the time and befriended the group of adventurers who would later become the heroes of the Ten-Towns of Icewind Dale.
